PATENT NOTICE
=============

NeuraTensor™ Fused SNN-SSM Architecture
Copyright © 2024-2025 Neuramorphic, Inc.
All rights reserved.

PATENT PENDING

This software contains proprietary algorithms and implementations related to:

1. Fused Spiking Neural Network (SNN) and State Space Model (SSM) architecture
2. Single-pass CUDA kernel implementation for hybrid neuromorphic inference
3. Hardware-accelerated neuromorphic computing on NVIDIA GPU architectures
4. Novel spike-driven state space computation methods

Patent applications have been filed covering the core algorithms, architecture,
and implementation methods contained in this software.

The compiled binary (neuratensor_core.so) is provided under a limited use license.
Reverse engineering, decompilation, or disassembly is strictly prohibited.

TRADEMARK

NeuraTensor™ is a trademark of Neuramorphic, Inc.

please contact:
